      • verifyJwTokenSecp256k1

        public static <T> JwtPayload<T> verifyJwTokenSecp256k1(String jwtToken,
                                                       String aud)
                                                throws JwtExpirationException,
                                                       InvalidKeyException,
                                                       NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                       SignatureException,
                                                       NoSuchProviderException,
                                                       InvalidKeySpecException,
                                                       JwtVerifyException,
                                                       AudienceException
        Verify that a JWT is signed correctly.
        Type Parameters:
        T - This is the type parameter
        Parameters:
        jwtToken - access token JWT
        aud - audience who receive el jwt
        Returns:
        JwtPayload Object JWT
        Throws:
        JwtExpirationException - Jwt Expiration
        InvalidKeySpecException - Invalid Key Spec
        NoSuchProviderException - No Such Provider
        SignatureException - Signature error
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - No Such Algorithm
        JwtVerifyException - jwt is not valid
        AudienceException - audience incorrect
        InvalidKeyException - Invalid Key

      • generateJwTokenSecp256k1

        public static <T> String generateJwTokenSecp256k1(String privateKey,
                                                  String did,
                                                  String audience,
                                                  T presentation,
                                                  Date expiritionDate)
                                           throws InvalidKeyException,
                                                  NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                  SignatureException,
                                                  NoSuchProviderException,
                                                  InvalidKeySpecException,
                                                  IOException
        Generate JwT secp256k1
        Type Parameters:
        T - This is the type parameter of presentation
        Parameters:
        privateKey - private key
        did - The Decentralized identifier
        audience - audience who receive el jwt
        presentation - object in the payload
        expiritionDate - when the access jwt expired
        Returns:
        access token jwt
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException - Invalid Key
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - No Such Algorithm
        SignatureException - Signature error
        NoSuchProviderException - No Such Provider
        InvalidKeySpecException - Invalid Key Spec
        IOException - io exception
